name: media_stop
description: This function is used to stop media playback on a specified SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to stop media playback.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to stop media playback.

parameters.name: appname
parameters.description: The name of the application that is currently playing.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the media that is currently playing.

parameters.name: cast
parameters.description: The cast of the media that is currently playing.
